content: आचम् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To sip, lick, lap drink (a small quantity); नाचेमे हिममपि वारि वारणेन <ls>Ki. 7. 34</ls>; पर्याप्तमाचामति <ls>U. 4. 1</ls>; <ls>Bv. 4. 38</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 60</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">5. 139.</ls> {@--2@} To rinse the mouth (with <ab>instr.</ab> of the thing); <ls>Ms. 2. 61.</ls> {@--3@} To lick up, dry or drink up, absorb; आचामति स्वेदलवान् मुखे ते <ls>R. 13. 20.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To cause to sip water; <ls>Ms. 3. 251</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">5. 142.</ls>
